    Interdisciplinary Quantum Materials at National Taiwan University

    We are a theory-driven experimentation group using first-principles methods, machine learning, and advanced characterization to design and understand quantum materials.

    Research Topics

    AI/ML for Materials

    Keywords: Graph neural network, Diffusion model, High-throughput calculation

    Photonics in Materials

    Keywords: Raman spectra, Photovoltaics, Photocatalysis, Second harmonic generation, Excitons effect

    Thermoelectricity

    Keywords: Seebeck effect, Electrical conductivity, Thermal conductivity, Carrier mobility, Low‐dimensional materials

    Strain Engineering

    Keyworks: Artificial muscles, Ideal strength, Nanomechanics, Electromechanics, Optomechanics
